name: READY TO SHIP- POLKA DOT- MOMMY WRAP BABY SLING/CARRIER FREE SHIPPING
description:
Ever heard of the Moby Wrap? Well these are just like them except less expensive, WAY cuter, and less bulky. I call them Mommy Wraps : )

This vibrant turquoise fabric with a coordinating fabric panel make this wrap ultra fabulous and perfect for summer.

* Can be used for newborns all the way up to 35 pounds!
* Evenly distributes weight so no back or shoulder pain!
* Reversible so if dad want's to wear baby but doesn't like the front panel, just flip it around and it's a "Daddy Wrap"
* $35 each
* Baby can be worn facing you in front, facing the world in front, on your hip, on your back, or even as a snuggle hold on your chest.

FREE SHIPPING!

name: READY TO SHIP- Mama to be gift set
description:
Want to look and feel fabulous during labor and in those first pictures of you and your little angel? How about a Mama-to-be designer gift set?

Set comes with....
* designer delivery hospital gown
* matching pillowcase
* matching burp cloth
* matching oversized baby blanket
* matching wipes case
* matching set of reusable nursing pads
(all proceeds from the nursing pads will be donated to the Susan G. Komen For the Cure Foundation.)

Delivery Gown: All of my gowns are 100% cotton and are hospital approved. I even wore one in the OR during my c-section. The backs tie all the way up and overlap in the back so there won't be any embarrassing exposure should you need to get up and walk around. Both shoulders unvelcro for easy access for breastfeeding. All gowns come with a detachable coordinating ribbon to tie around your baby bump for an ultra chic look. This particular gown fits sizes S-L.

Pillowcase: Most women bring their own pillow to the hospital for much better comfort. Why not go one step further with this adorable matching pillowcase. Made from the same 100% cotton fabrics, fits any standard sized pillow.

Oversized baby blanket: This blanket is sure to keep your little one ultra cozy and is large enough to be a crib blanket (35"x41.5"). Made from 100% cotton Zebra fabric on the front and the soft black minky dot fabric on the back. To make this blanket even more chic I have double stitched the edges with pink thread to go right along with the rest of this great set.

Wipes case: Has the same fabulous black and white zebra fabric used through out this set with added pink ribbon and button accents. This is the perfect accessory for any trendy mama.

Burp Cloth: The front fabric is the same great 100% cotton black and white Zebra fabric with a pink ribbon accent. The reverse side is a black soft minky dot fabric. Burp cloth measures 7" x 20".

Reusable nursing pads: These are a great way to keep cost and waste down. Made from 100% cotton and terry cloth with a middle layer of felt for added absorbency, just throw them in the wash and use them over and over again.

name: READY TO SHIP- ADORABLE OVERSIZED KEEPSAKE QUILT FOR BABY GIRL - FREE SHIPPING
description: Made from soft cuddle flannel and pink minky dot fabrics. Quilts are great as a keepsake that can be passed down from generation to generation. Measures 35 x 36". Reverse side is matching butterfly soft cuddle flannel as used in the facing of the quilt. Made to last!
